sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const BookingForm = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { from, to, date, busId } = location.state || {}; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', seats: 1, gender: 'male' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // In a real app, this would make an API call to process the booking alert('Booking successful! Your ticket has been sent to your email.'); navigate('/'); }; return (

Passenger Details

{/* Journey Summary */}

From

{from}

To

{to}

Date

{date}

Bus ID

{busId}

{/* Booking Form */}
setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value })} required />
setFormData({ ...formData, email: e.target.value })} required />
setFormData({ ...formData, phone: e.target.value })} required />
setFormData({ ...formData, seats: parseInt(e.target.value) })} required />
); }; export default BookingForm;
